column23:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Spruce up your dull winter wear with this classy jacket from DressBerry. This piece has everything that gives you an elegant look in this chilly weather. We suggest you team it with a plain contrast tee or just a pair of jeans or jeggings and funky sneakers.

  • Product Details

  • Maroon and black printed jacket with patterned weave
